name: Trick Or... Trick?
description:
ATTENTION: You may be unable to play the Web version of the game due to your browser. To play the game just download it for free from the "Download Now" button above. Sorry for the inconvenience. -S.F.

STORY:
Every year Mr. Jones refuses to give Guy candy for Halloween. Now it's time for Guy to get his revenge by trashing his house.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move
  • E to Pick Up Weapons
  • left mouse click to shoot
  • R to chance weapon

The game does not have any pre-made asset.

All the assets in the game were created for the Trick Or Treat Game Jam.
